member.name: T:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyCode
member.summary: Enumeration for the key codes. If keycode & 0xff000000 == 0x01000000 then this key code is directly encoded to 24-bit UCS character. The UCS value is keycode & 0x00ffffff. Defines the list of keys supported by the system. Note that certain keys may not be available on all the devices.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyCode.Cancel
member.summary: The Cancel, Stop, Abort, Exit key.

member.name: T:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask
member.summary: Enumeration for the key masks. The key masks indicate which modifier keys are pressed down during the keyboard hit. The special MASK_RELEASED indicates the key release event.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.Pressed
member.summary: Key press event without the modifier key.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.Shift
member.summary: The Shift key is pressed down.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.CapsLock
member.summary: The CapsLock key is pressed down.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.Control
member.summary: The Control key is pressed down.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.Alt
member.summary: The Alt key is pressed down.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.Meta
member.summary: The Meta key is pressed down.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.Win
member.summary: The Win key (between Control and Alt) is pressed down.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.Hyper
member.summary: The Hyper key is pressed down.

member.name: F:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask.NumLock
member.summary: The NumLock key is pressed down.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.FocusedIn
member.summary: Called when an associated text input UI control has focus.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.FocusedOut
member.summary: Called when an associated text input UI control loses focus.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.SurroundingTextUpdated
member.summary: Called when an associated text input UI control responds to a request with the surrounding text.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.InputContextReset
member.summary: Called to reset the input context of an associated text input UI control.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.CursorPositionUpdated
member.summary: Called when the position of the cursor in an associated text input UI control changes.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.LanguageSet
member.summary: Called to set the preferred language to the input panel. It will only be called when the client application changes the edit field's language attribute after the input panel is shown.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.DataSet
member.summary: Called to set the application specific data to deliver to the input panel.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.LayoutSet
member.summary: Called when an associated text input UI control requests the input panel to set its layout. It will only be called when the client application changes the edit field's layout attribute after the input panel is shown.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.ReturnKeySet
member.summary: Called when an associated text input UI control requests the input panel to set the Return key label. The input panel can show the text or an image on the Return button, according to the Return key action.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.ReturnKeyStateSet
member.summary: Called when an associated text input UI control requests the input panel to enable or disable the Return key state.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.DisplayLanguageChanged
member.summary: Called when the system display language is changed.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.RotationChanged
member.summary: Called when the device is rotated.

member.name: E:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.AccessibilityStateChanged
member.summary: Called when Accessibility in settings application is on or off.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.SetLanguageRequestedCallback(Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.OutAction{System.String})
member.param: Called when an associated text input UI control requests the language from the input panel, requesting for language code.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.SetProcessKeyCallback(Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.BoolAction{Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyCode,Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask,Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodDeviceInformation})
member.summary: Sets the processKey action. If the key event is from the external device, DeviceInfo will have its name, class, and subclass information.
member.param: The action is called when the key event is received from the external devices or the SendKey function. This Event processes the key event before an associated text input UI control does.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.SetDataRequestedCallback(Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.OutArrayAction{System.Byte})
member.param: Called when an associated text input UI control requests the application specific data from the input panel, requesting for data array and it's length.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.SetGeometryRequestedCallback(Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.OutAction{Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.Rect})
member.param: Called when an associated text input UI control requests the position and size from the input panel, requesting for x, y, w, h values.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.Run(System.Action,System.Action,System.Action{Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.ContextId,Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodContext},System.Action{Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.ContextId})
member.summary: Runs the main loop of the IME application. This function starts to run the IME application's main loop.
member.remarks: This API is a blocking call, as it starts the main loop of the application.
member.param: This is called to initialize the IME application before the main loop starts up.
This is called when the IME application is terminated.
This is called when the IME application is shown. It provides the context information and the context ID.
This is called when the IME application is hidden. It provides the context ID.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
This exception can be due to operation failed.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.SendKeyEvent(Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyCode,Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a key event to the associated text input UI control.
member.remarks: This function sends a key down or up event with the key mask to the client application. If forwardKey is true, this key event goes to the edit filed directly. And if forwardKey is false, the ProcessKey event receives the key event before the edit field.
member.param: The key code to be sent.
The modifier key mask.
The flag to send the key event directly to the edit field.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.CommitString(System.String)
member.summary: Sends the text to the associated text input UI control.
member.param: The string to be committed.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.ShowPreEditString
member.summary: Requests to show the pre-edit string.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.HidePreEditString
member.summary: Requests to hide the pre-edit string.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.UpdatePreEditString(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.PreEditAttribute})
member.param: The string to be updated in pre-edit.

The list which has ime_preedit_attribute lists, strings can be composed of multiple string attributes: underline, highlight color, and reversal color. The attrs list can be empty if no attributes to set.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.RequestSurroundingText(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Requests the surrounding text from the position of the cursor, asynchronously.
member.param: The maximum length of the string to be retrieved before the cursor, -1 means unlimited.
The maximum length of the string to be retrieved after the cursor, -1 means unlimited.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
This can occur due to the following reasons: 1) The IME main loop has not started yet. 2) The necessary event is not set.
member.postcondition: The requested surrounding text can be received using the SurroundingTextUpdated event, only if it is set.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.DeleteSurroundingText(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Requests to delete the surrounding text.
member.param: The offset value from the cursor position.
The length of the text to delete.
member.exception: This exception can be due to an invalid parameter.
This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.GetSurroundingText(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Gets the surrounding text from the position of the cursor, synchronously.
member.param: The maximum length of the string to be retrieved before the cursor, -1 means unlimited.
The maximum length of the string to be retrieved after the cursor, -1 means unlimited.
The surrounding text.
The cursor position.
member.exception: This exception can be due to out of memory.
This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.exception: This exception can be due to an invalid parameter.
This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.summary: Allows the floating input panel window to move along with the mouse pointer when the mouse is pressed.
member.remarks: This function can be used in floating mode. If the floating mode is deactivated, calling this function has no effect.

member.summary: Does not allow the movement of the floating input panel window with the mouse pointer when the mouse is pressed.
member.remarks: This function can be used in floating mode. If the floating mode is deactivated, calling this function has no effect.
member.exception: This exception can be due to permission denied.
The IME main loop has not started yet.

member.name: M:Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.SetProcessKeyCallback(Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodEditor.BoolAction{System.UInt32,Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyCode,Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.KeyMask,Tizen.Uix.InputMethod.InputMethodDeviceInformation})
member.summary: Sets the processKey action. If the key event is from the external device, DeviceInfo will have its name, class, and subclass information.
member.param: true if the event was processed, otherwise the event was not processed and was forwarded to the client application. The first parameter is X11 key code and the second parameter is key symbol. The action is called when the key event is received from the external devices or the SendKey function. This Event processes the key event before an associated text input UI control does.
